com.google.i18n.pseudolocalization.message

Interface VisitorContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleMessage.Context

    public interface VisitorContext
    Context around a MessageFragment that allows inserting, removing, and replacing nodes.

    All changes are made on a copy of a message, so mutating the message while visiting it does not alter the visitation order.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Insert a new MessageFragment before another fragment, or at the beginning of the message if none is supplied.
      void replaceFragment(MessageFragment fragment, List<MessageFragment> replacements)
      Replace a fragment with zero or more MessageFragments.
      void replaceFragment(MessageFragment fragment, MessageFragment... replacements)
      Replace a fragment with zero or more MessageFragments.
